author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Lifelong Learning and Extension, Avinashilingam University for Women, will conduct a free Women Entrepreneurship Development Programme from January 25 to 29.

Thirty candidates will be admitted on first come first served basis. Under graduates aged between 18 and 40 can apply. For details, contact: K. Vasantha, phone: 0422-244971544 or email to:lll_adu@yahoo.in

Population register

The National Population Register will be updated in all the taluks and municipalities of the Nilgiris District.

A government official will visit houses for the purpose, according to a release here.

The exercise that began on January 18 will continue till February 5.
title: Training programme
